item.title: Noripah Kamso new chairman of Bank Rakyat - The Star Online
item.description:
Noripah Kamso new chairman of Bank Rakyat  The Star Online

KUALA LUMPUR: The Entrepreneur Development Minister has appointed Datuk Noripah Kamso as the new chairman of Bank Rakyat with effect from Thursday. Noripah, who was an advisor of CIMB Islamic, takes over from Tan Sri Shukry Mohd Salleh. Shukry was removed on Nov 26 due to his involvement in the original audit report of 1Malaysia Development Bhd (1MDB). The minister said Noripah was the chief executive of CIMB-Principal Islamic Asset Management Sdn Bhd and also of CIMB-Principal Asset Management Sdn Bhd.
